primaryPhoto.description:
Step into a heart-racing immersive adaptation of F Scott Fitzgerald’s seminal jazz-age novel THE GREAT GATSBY, which puts you in the heart of the action. Slip on your dancing shoes and watch the story unfold around you in this unique theatrical performance at Immersive LDN.
THE GREAT GATSBY, London’s longest running immersive theatrical production, is brought to the heart of the West End by director Alexander Wright and Olivier Award-winning producers Immersive Everywhere.
Lauded as “the most fun you can have in the West End.” (Daily Express), be sure to book your tickets for a dazzling experience!
Book your THE GREAT GATSBY theatre tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
